faq.title: FAQ
faq.subtitle: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Still have questions? Don’t worry, we’re here to help! Read through our frequently asked questions. If your question wasn't addressed, just leave it, and we’ll get back to you as soon as possible.

quest.title: Your Question
quest.placeholder: Write your question and we’ll answer it

quest1.title: How to choose the right paint color?
quest1.answer: To choose a paint color, we recommend using our color palettes and online consultation. You can also order color samples to evaluate them in the real lighting conditions of your space.

quest2.title: What surfaces can be painted with Remalux paints?
quest2.answer: Our paints are suitable for painting walls, ceilings, doors, furniture, metal, and wooden surfaces.

quest3.title: How long does it take for the paint to dry completely?
quest3.answer: The drying time depends on the temperature and humidity in the room. Usually, the paint dries within 2-3 hours.

quest4.title: Are Remalux paints eco-friendly?
quest4.answer: Yes, all Remalux paints are water-based and contain no harmful substances.

quest5.title: Can I apply the paint myself, or do I need a specialist?
quest5.answer: Our paints are easy to apply yourself. You’ll need a brush, roller, and painter’s tape.

quest6.title: Where can I buy Remalux products?
quest6.answer: You can buy Remalux paints at our partner stores or order them on our website.

newsletter.title: Join Our Newsletter
newsletter.description: Stay updated on trends and decorating ideas in our new monthly newsletter.

partnership.history_description: Remalux was founded over 30 years ago with one simple mission – to offer the highest quality paints that inspire unique and lasting projects. Since then, we have grown from a small factory to an industry leader known for innovation and responsible production.
partnership.title: Create Bold Projects with Remalux
partnership.description: Welcome to Remalux! We are a leading manufacturer of high-quality paints known for their variety of shades and durability. Join our partner network and create bold and lasting finishes for the most daring projects with us.
partnership.history_1990: Remalux opened its doors with the goal of creating paints that would inspire and transform the world around us.
partnership.history_1995: We introduced our first line of interior paints, quickly gaining customer trust thanks to their high quality and variety of shades.
partnership.history_2000: We began using new production technologies, significantly increasing the durability and eco-friendliness of our products.
partnership.history_2010: Remalux expanded nationwide, offering products in major retail chains and specialized stores.
partnership.history_2015: We launched an export program, entering international markets and starting collaborations with partners worldwide.
partnership.history_2023: We opened a modern production facility, increasing our capacity and expanding the product range to better meet our customers' needs.
partnership.branches_description: Remalux has 6 branches in all major cities of Kazakhstan, with the head office in Almaty.
partnership.news_description: Want to be the first to know about new products, promotions, and inspiring projects? Follow us on Instagram! Stay updated, find ideas for your projects, and keep up with all the Remalux news. Join our online family and be part of a world of vibrant paints and creative solutions!
partnership.application_form_description: Want to become a Remalux partner and offer our clients the best paints? Fill out the application, and our manager will contact you to discuss partnership terms and answer all your questions.

partners.title: Become a Partner
partners.text: Looking for a reliable partner in the paint sales industry? Join us! We offer high-quality products, advantageous collaboration terms, and support at every stage. Be part of a successful business and reach new heights with us! Contact us to discuss all partnership details.

hero_section.title: LLP 'K-COLOR' with the brand 'REMALUX' – High European Quality at Affordable Prices.
hero_section.description: LLP 'K-COLOR' with the brand 'REMALUX' is a leader in the production of paint and coatings, located in the Republic of Kazakhstan. We offer consumers a wide range of high-quality paints, made under British license from raw materials by renowned French, Belgian, German, Dutch, and American manufacturers.

why_choose_us.title: Why Do Customers Choose Our Products?
why_choose_us.description: Our paints are trusted for their high quality, innovative solutions, and economical consumption. Add affordable prices and a wide range, and you’ll understand why we’re chosen again.

quality.title: High Quality
quality.description: Our paints undergo strict quality control, ensuring excellent coverage and durability on any surface.

innovation.title: Innovative Production Technologies
innovation.description: We use advanced technologies to create paints that are easy to apply, dry quickly, and provide rich colors.

economy.title: Economical Material Consumption
economy.description: Our paints provide high coverage, allowing you to reduce consumption and lower costs.

price.title: Competitive Prices
price.description: We offer excellent value for money so you can get a professional product at an affordable price.

assortment.title: Wide Product Range
assortment.description: In our range, you will find paints for any needs – from interior to industrial coatings, in a variety of colors and textures.

for_whom.title: Who Is Our Product Designed For?
for_whom.description: Our products are designed to easily meet the demands of the most discerning professionals for use in prestigious representative-level projects. Additionally, they are perfect for regular consumers looking for materials for home use and DIY cosmetic repairs.

remalux_section.title: REMALUX: Everything You Need for a Perfect Result
remalux_section.description: REMALUX offers high-quality paint materials with modern technologies and excellent service. All products are safe and meet European standards.

innovation.title: Innovative Technologies and Modern Production Methods
innovation.description: The production of paints at REMALUX is based on modern technologies and chemical science advancements, ensuring high quality and safety at competitive prices.

service.title: Customer Service
service.description: We provide pre-purchase and post-purchase services, meeting customer demands through high product quality and excellent service.

assortment.title: Wide Product Range
assortment.description: REMALUX offers textured coatings, water-based paints, varnishes, acrylic glue, and other materials. We will help you choose the right shade and guarantee high quality at competitive prices.

safety.title: Safety and Comfort in Use
safety.description: Water-based products are non-toxic and odorless, ensuring comfortable use for both professionals and DIY enthusiasts. Our paints are safe for people and pets.

our_fleet.title: Our Fleet: Fast and Reliable Delivery
our_fleet.description: Our products are designed to easily meet the demands of the most discerning professionals for use in prestigious representative-level projects. Additionally, they are perfect for regular consumers looking for materials for home use and DIY cosmetic repairs.

privacy_policy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy_policy.intro: The Privacy Policy (hereinafter – the Policy) applies to personal data that LLP 'K-COLOR' (hereinafter – LLP) may receive from the user when the user visits the website https://remalux.kz (hereinafter – the Website) and uses its services, and explains how the user's personal data will be processed and protected.

terms.title: 1. DEFINITIONS
terms.admin: Website Administration (hereinafter – the Administration) – authorized employees...
terms.personal_data: Personal Data – any information relating to an identified or identifiable individual...
terms.data_processing: Processing of Personal Data – any operation or set of operations...
terms.confidentiality: Confidentiality of Personal Data – a mandatory requirement to ensure...
terms.site: Website – the website of the Remalux online store (hereinafter – the Website), a set of interconnected web pages...
terms.user: Website User (hereinafter – User) – a person who has access to the Website...
terms.cookies: Cookies – a small piece of data sent by a web server and stored on the user's computer...
terms.ip_address: IP Address – a unique network address of a node in a computer network through which the User accesses...
terms.product: Product – the item that the User orders on the website and pays for through payment systems.

general.title: 2. GENERAL PROVISIONS
general.usage: Using the Remalux online store website by the User means acceptance of this Privacy Policy...
general.disagreement: If the User disagrees with the terms of the Privacy Policy, the User must stop using the Website.
general.application: This Privacy Policy applies to the website owned by LLP 'K-COLOR'...
general.verification: The Administration does not verify the accuracy of personal data provided by the User.

subject.title: 3. SUBJECT OF THE PRIVACY POLICY
subject.obligations: This Privacy Policy establishes the Administration's obligations regarding non-disclosure...
subject.data: Personal data permitted for processing under this Privacy Policy...
subject.ssl: The online store uses a certified SSL encryption key for data transmission via the HTTPS protocol...
subject.cookies: Disabling cookies may result in the inability to access parts of the website that require authorization.
subject.other_info: Any other personal information not specified above is subject to secure storage and non-disclosure...

purposes.title: 4. PURPOSES OF COLLECTING USER'S PERSONAL INFORMATION
purposes.identification: To identify the User registered on the Website for further authorization...
purposes.access: To provide the User with access to personalized data on the Website.
purposes.feedback: To establish feedback with the User, including sending notifications...
purposes.location: To determine the User's location to ensure security and prevent fraud...

processing.title: 5. METHODS AND TERMS OF PROCESSING PERSONAL DATA
processing.methods: The User's personal data is processed without time limitation, by any legal method...
processing.third_parties: The User agrees that the Administration has the right to transfer personal data to third parties...
processing.government: The User's personal data may be transferred to authorized government authorities of the Republic of Kazakhstan...
processing.loss: In the event of loss or disclosure of personal data, the Administration is not obligated to inform the User...
processing.measures: The Administration takes necessary organizational and technical measures to protect the User's personal information...
processing.cooperation: The Administration and the User take all necessary measures to prevent losses or other negative consequences...

rights.title: 6. RIGHTS AND OBLIGATIONS OF THE PARTIES
rights.decision: The User has the right to make a free decision to provide their personal data...
rights.information: The User has the right to obtain information from the Administration regarding the processing of their personal data...
rights.use: The Administration is obligated to use the received information solely for the purposes specified in section 4 of this Privacy Policy...
rights.confidentiality: The Administration is obligated to ensure the storage of confidential information in secrecy, not to disclose it without the prior written permission of the User...
rights.blocking: The Administration is obligated to block the User's personal data upon the User's request or inquiry...

responsibilities.title: 7. RESPONSIBILITIES OF THE PARTIES
responsibilities.loss: The Administration, failing to fulfill its obligations, is liable for the damages incurred by the User...
responsibilities.disclosure: The Administration is not responsible in the event of loss or disclosure of confidential information if such information...
responsibilities.law: The User is fully responsible for compliance with the laws of the Republic of Kazakhstan...
responsibilities.deletion: The Administration is not responsible to the User for any loss or damage suffered by the User as a result of deletion...
responsibilities.usage: The Administration is not responsible for any direct or indirect losses arising from the use or inability to use the Website...

disputes.title: 8. DISPUTE RESOLUTION
disputes.pre_court: Before filing a lawsuit for disputes arising from the relationship between the User and the Administration...
disputes.notification: The recipient of the claim shall notify the claimant in writing or electronically within 20 calendar days of receiving the claim...
disputes.arbitration: If no agreement is reached, the dispute will be referred to the Arbitration Court of Almaty.
disputes.law: This Privacy Policy and the relationship between the User and the Administration are governed by the current laws of the Republic of Kazakhstan.

additional.title: 9. ADDITIONAL TERMS
additional.changes: The Administration has the right to amend this Privacy Policy without the User's consent.
additional.effective_date: The new Privacy Policy comes into effect from the moment it is posted on the Website unless otherwise provided by the new version of the Privacy Policy.

payment_delivery.title: DELIVERY METHODS AND COST
payment_delivery.pickup: Pickup – collect the product at the company's office within 3 business days after the order status changes to 'Available'.
cash_payment_details: Cash payment is available at the retail store's checkout upon product pickup.
Payment is made in the national currency 'tenge'.
A receipt is issued after payment.
payment_delivery.card_payment_on_receipt: Payment by Bank Card upon Receipt:
card_payment_on_receipt_details: Payment by bank card is available at the retail store's checkout upon product pickup.
payment_delivery.card_payment_online: Payment by Bank Card on the Website when Placing an Order
card_payment_online_details: This payment method allows payment by bank card. Cards from almost any bank, systems like Visa and MasterCard, for which your issuing bank has permitted financial transactions on the Internet, are accepted.

Attention! Not all bank cards are initially set up for online payments. To check if your card supports online financial transactions, please consult with a representative from your issuing bank. Usually, if the card does not have this option, it can be enabled by submitting a corresponding request at your bank. This is a one-time setup. For details, please contact your bank.

The system will automatically redirect you to the ePay page of Halyk Bank of Kazakhstan JSC to enter your card details. Please follow the instructions on the page. After you verify that the card details and email address are entered correctly, click 'Pay'. A notification of the payment will be sent to the email address specified on this page. By default, the email address registered on the online store's website will be used in the 'Your email' field. You can change the email for receiving notifications. After completing the payment, you can leave this page or return to the online store by clicking the corresponding button.

public_offer.title: PUBLIC OFFER AGREEMENT
public_offer.subtitle: For the online store remalux.kz
public_offer.intro: This agreement between the online store remalux.kz, hereinafter referred to as the 'Online Store/Seller', and the user of the online store services, hereinafter referred to as the 'Buyer', defines the conditions for purchasing products through the online store website.

terms.title: TERMS AND DEFINITIONS
terms.buyer: Buyer – any fully capable individual who orders, purchases products by placing an Order on the website
terms.seller: Seller – LLP 'K-COLOR' (BIN 010440005708), an organization that sells products remotely, under a retail purchase and sale agreement, concluded based on the Buyer's review of the Seller's offer on the website at remalux.kz.
terms.store: Online Store – a website owned by the Seller, where products offered by the Seller to its Buyers for placing Orders are displayed, along with the payment and delivery terms for those Orders.
terms.product: Product – a material object, not withdrawn from civil circulation, presented for sale on the Website and available at the time of shipment confirmation.
terms.order: Order – a properly placed request by the Buyer for the delivery to a specified address of a list of Products selected on the Website.
terms.account: Personal Account – the Buyer's personal page on the Website, for which a login and password are required for access, where information about the Buyer and their Orders is stored.
terms.delivery_service: Delivery Service – a third party providing delivery services to Buyers under a contract with the Seller.

general_provisions.title: 1. GENERAL PROVISIONS
general_provisions.item1: By ordering products through the Online Store, the Buyer agrees to the Terms of Sale of products set forth below.
general_provisions.item2: These Terms and the information about the Product presented on the Website constitute a public offer in accordance with Article 395 of the Civil Code of the Republic of Kazakhstan, and by accepting these terms, the individual making the offer accepts this offer by paying for the Seller's Product under the terms of this Agreement.
general_provisions.item3: The relationship between the Buyer and the Seller is governed by the provisions of the Civil Code of the Republic of Kazakhstan, the Law of the Republic of Kazakhstan dated May 4, 2010, No. 274-IV 'On Consumer Protection', and other regulatory legal acts of the current legislation of the Republic of Kazakhstan.
general_provisions.item4: The Seller reserves the right to make changes to these Terms, and the Buyer agrees to regularly monitor changes in the 'Public Offer Agreement' section.
general_provisions.item5: The Buyer agrees to the Terms by clicking the 'Place Order' button at the last stage of placing an Order on the Website.

registration.title: 2. REGISTRATION ON THE WEBSITE
registration.item1: To place an Order, the Buyer is recommended to register on the Website.
registration.item2: The Seller is not responsible for the accuracy and correctness of the information provided by the Buyer during registration.
registration.item3: The Buyer agrees not to disclose the login and password specified during the registration of the personal account to third parties. If the Buyer suspects that their login and password are compromised or may be used without authorization, the Buyer agrees to notify the Seller via the feedback form.

order_placement.title: 3. ORDER PLACEMENT AND FULFILLMENT TIME
order_placement.item1: The Buyer's Order can be placed in the following ways: accepted by phone or placed independently by the Buyer on the Website.
order_placement.item2: When placing an Order, the Buyer must provide the following information: Full Name of the Buyer or Order Recipient, delivery address, contact email, phone, delivery method, payment method.
order_placement.item3: The Seller has the right to refuse to conclude an agreement and place an Order without stating reasons.
order_placement.item4: The order fulfillment time is from one business day and can be negotiated individually depending on the characteristics and quantity of the Product.
order_placement.item5: Information materials on the Website are for reference only and may not fully convey information about the Product.

delivery.title: 4. DELIVERY
delivery.item1: The methods of delivering products are agreed upon by the Buyer with the online store manager.
delivery.item2: Orders are delivered to the address specified by the Buyer or picked up from the store.
delivery.item3: The Seller will make every effort to comply with the delivery times, but delays due to circumstances beyond the Seller's control are possible.
delivery.item4: The risk of accidental loss or damage to the Product passes to the Buyer upon receipt of the Order and signature on the documents.
delivery.item5: The delivery cost for each Order is calculated individually and indicated at the last stage of placing the Order.

price_payment.title: 5. PRICE AND PAYMENT OF THE PRODUCT
price_payment.item1: The Product price in the online store is indicated in tenge.
price_payment.item2: The Seller has the right to change the price of the Product unilaterally; however, the price of the paid Product is not subject to change.
price_payment.item3: The Product price is indicated at the last stage of placing the Order and is current at the time of clicking the 'Place Order' button.
price_payment.item4: The methods of payment for the Product are indicated on the Website. The Buyer can pay for the order in any available way.

returns.title: 6. PRODUCT AND FUNDS RETURN
returns.item1: Returning products of proper quality is possible within 14 days from the date of receipt, provided the product's appearance and purchase documents are preserved.
returns.item2: Returning products of improper quality is possible if defects are found, no later than 3 months before the product's expiration date.
returns.item3: Refunds are made to the bank card used to pay for the Order.

copyright.title: 7. COPYRIGHT
copyright.content: All materials presented on the Website are the property of LLP 'K-COLOR' and are protected by copyright law. The materials are intended for personal, non-commercial use and cannot be used without the Seller's written permission.

warranty.title: 8. WARRANTIES AND LIABILITY
warranty.content: The Seller is not responsible for any damage caused to the Buyer as a result of improper use of the Products. All disputes are resolved through negotiations or in court in accordance with the laws of the Republic of Kazakhstan.

confidentiality.title: 9. CONFIDENTIALITY AND PROTECTION OF PERSONAL INFORMATION
confidentiality.content: The Seller agrees not to disclose the Buyer's personal data. The Buyer can withdraw consent to the processing of personal data through the feedback form on the Website.

footer.content: Detailed information can be found on the official website: remalux.kz.

hero.title: High European Quality at Affordable Prices

download_remalux.title: Remalux
download_remalux.description: Visualize your idea with our app! Simply point the camera at the wall and choose a color to see it come to life in real time. A great way to pick the perfect shade and imagine how your interior will look!

about_us.title: Create the Perfect Finish with Remalux Paints!
about_us.description: LLP 'K-COLOR' with the brand 'REMALUX' offers high-quality paint materials at European standards at affordable prices. Our company, located in the Republic of Kazakhstan, is a leading manufacturer of paints made under British license. We take pride in our wide product range made from raw materials by top suppliers from France, Belgium, Germany, the Netherlands, and the USA.

park.title: Our Fleet: Fast and Reliable Delivery
park.text: Our products are designed to easily meet the demands of the most discerning professionals for use in prestigious representative-level projects. Additionally, they are perfect for regular consumers looking for materials for home use and DIY cosmetic repairs.
